title: SLOW COOKED GREEK LAMB
directions: Please note, this recipe needs to be prepared in advance
Add onion, garlic, paprika, fresh herbs, lemon rind, dried spices, salt and pepper to mixer bowl with 50 g water. Blend for 30 sec/speed 8/MC on.
Rub marinade mixture into leg of lamb and refrigerate over night to marinate.
Brown lamb well in a medium to high heat non-stick pan, without any oil.
When lamb is browned, remove to slow cooker bowl.
If there are any yummy herbs and spices left behind in the pan, add ½ cup of water, 1 tsp of vegetable stock concentrate and scrape up any herbs and spices left behind. Add to slow cooker bowl.
ingredients: 1.7 kg | 3.7 lbs deboned leg of lamb, trimmed of excess fat
120 g | 4.2 oz brown onion, peeled and halved
